description: User submits the event registration form with contact information and payment method selection
User clicks 'Buy Ticket(s)' button to begin checkout process for a training event
User successfully completes a payment or invoice request
User submits the contact page inquiry form
User subscribes to the newsletter via footer form
User submits a request for customized in-house training
User requests an event agenda to be sent to their email
User downloads calendar ICS file to add event to their calendar
User successfully applies a discount code during registration
User opens participant details modal to edit participant information
User changes the number of participants/tickets during registration
